meanings.definition: A place where people go to eat.
meanings.sent1: The local eateries serve delicious food.
meanings.sent2: Let's try out different eateries in town this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The eateries in this area are always bustling with hungry customers.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of eateries, finding the best one can be a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The neon sign outside the eatery beckoned us in with promises of tasty treats.

meanings.sent1: The eateries at the party enjoyed the buffet.
meanings.sent2: These eateries have diverse tastes and preferences.
meanings.sent3: The eateries at the table were eager to try the new dish.
meanings.sent4: The eateries in the group shared stories of their favorite meals.
meanings.sent5: The hungry eateries quickly finished their plates and asked for seconds.
